passed_tests.text: Lagos announces new solar energy initiative in Nigeria. The project will provide renewable energy to over 100,000 homes in the African country.
Johannesburg mining company reports record profits. The South African firm operates across the continent.
Nairobi startup raises $50M for AI technology. The Kenyan company plans to expand across Africa.
Accra business district sees record growth. Ghanaian economy shows strong performance.
Mexico City reports oil production increase. The Mexican state oil company sees growth.
Buenos Aires natural gas exports reach record high. Argentine energy sector shows strong performance.
Santiago copper mining company reports profits. Chilean mining sector continues to grow.
Lima mining conference attracts international investors. Peruvian mining sector shows growth.
Riyadh announces new oil production targets. Saudi Arabia continues to lead OPEC.
Dubai launches new solar energy initiative. The UAE continues to invest in renewable energy.
Doha natural gas exports reach record levels. Qatari energy sector shows strong performance.
Kuwait City oil production increases. Kuwaiti energy sector shows positive trends.
Manama energy conference attracts international investors. Bahraini energy sector shows growth.
Muscat natural gas production increases. Omani energy sector shows positive trends.
Tel Aviv startup raises $100M for AI technology. Israeli tech sector continues to grow.
Amman announces new renewable energy project. Jordanian government invests in solar power.
Beirut business district sees record growth. Lebanese economy shows strong performance.
Istanbul energy conference attracts international investors. Turkish energy sector shows growth.
Energy summit brings together leaders from Saudi Arabia, Brazil, and South Africa. The conference focuses on renewable energy across the Middle East, Latin America, and Africa.
Oil trade between Nigeria, Mexico, and Kuwait reaches record levels. The three countries represent Africa, Latin America, and the Middle East.
Technology company announces new AI product. The innovation will revolutionize the industry.
The company operates in the middle of the country. The business is located in the center of the region.
The company is based in New York, not New York City. The business operates in the United States.

failed_tests.text: Cairo announces new oil discovery in the Red Sea. The Egyptian government expects significant economic impact.
Casablanca hosts renewable energy conference. Moroccan officials discuss solar power expansion.
São Paulo announces new wind energy project. The Brazilian government invests in renewable energy.
Bogotá oil production increases. Colombian energy sector shows positive trends.

enhancements: Improve geographic keyword matching with better regex patterns
Add more specific location mappings for edge cases
monitoring: Monitor geographic detection accuracy in production
Track false positive and false negative rates

deployment_strategy: Improve geographic keyword matching with better regex patterns
Add more specific location mappings for edge cases
Deploy sources in phases: RSS feeds first, then direct scraping
Monitor performance and remove any sources that start failing
Implement rate limiting and respectful scraping practices
monitoring_plan: Set up alerts for source failures
Track article relevance and quality metrics
risk_mitigation: Test sources in staging environment before production
Implement fallback mechanisms for critical sources
Regular source health checks and maintenance
